name: tags-reference
teaser: The core functionality of Quanta is definitely the wikitag system.
author: admin
body:
The core functionality of Quanta is definitely the wikitag system.

Thanks to the wikitag system, you can build entire pages, and even entire applications, without writing a line of PHP (and in some cases, not even one of HTML / CSS !)

Those are the available tags at the moment:

[LIST]
title: Wikitags reference
